title: 9 Lives
description: No longer available.Kat's world has been turned upside down after meeting Caleb, the vampire. She is on the run, trying to escape the evil clutches of Adam when she discovers Caleb may not be telling her the truth. She has to run for her life and to save the others she cares about. Nothing is what it seems in this fast paced thriller.
author: Teresa Mummert
